: : Kup : :
Kup looked around at the wounded as he places his rifle back in subspace.

Kup: Those slaggin' Predacons. They never quit. How is everyone?


dishpanhandninja <foxmanroar1@...> wrote:"Sighes" Thank you for the help, but I assure you my friend..." He 
fired one of the cannons point blank at the second pred. "I can 
handle these two myself. he reached down and ran his hand over his 
maximal symbol and it became a red cross... "If you would be my 
cover, I will attend to the wounded thus far."
